title: Endure the Cold......?
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Karin-saaan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Rin-chan, I was starting to get ready that you wouldn’t show up.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Sorry. I got a bit lost.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Eh, you’re also bad with dir— ...Nevermind.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>What did you say? I’m bad with directions?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>It’s nothing. Besides, your cheeks are rosy, and your hands are cold.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ehehe. Did I dress too lightly, nya?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Hm, I guess it can’t be helped. You can borrow my scarf. And take this too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>A hand warmer! It’s so warm, nya~ Thanks, Karin-san. But wouldn’t you be the cold one now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>It won’t be a problem if I stick close to you, Rin-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ahaha! You can hold onto me as tightly as you want, nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
